director.name: 伊琳·泰勒·布罗德斯基 Irene Taylor Brodsky

this_title: One Last Hug: Three Days at Grief Camp
introduction: One Last Hug: Three Days at Grief Camp chronicles a three day summer camp for children learning to cope with the death of a loved one. With the guidance of trained professionals, grieving children as young as seven years old learn that their feelings are normal, and that by talking about them they can begin to heal. A testament to the healing power of shared sorrow, One Last Hug shows the often-unseen and particular experience of children's grief.
